unnormalised: Ena, hana hapta re Speedy Delivery leka inak ad'ge kharap anubhab hoylen tingen. Koy inak oṛak' te parcel supurtang miting tahekan, 12/B, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050 re, menkhan koy badli re 12/C re koy emkeda! Bhagya te, inren tehen koy fon keding, menkhan jodi koy baṅ fon kede khan do chi hoy koka? In sapap' ge CCD pakka re enag thao' china lekate lelag etah tahekan. Sari katha, unkren delivery hor' koy ad'ge besh training darkar.
normalised:
Heñ, horo hapta re Speedy Delivery then in do bahu kharap anubhav hoehlena.
In oṛak bar geleta B, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050 re pakrej dolivery hoyok' leka tahẽkana, menkhan boko do bar geleta C re boko emkedi!
Bhagya re, in then pakkiṛi kolkediñ, menkhan jodi boko kolkediñ tahekan?
In do sạrhes te "C-C-D set" in lailada cinha leka.
Okkoḍa te, onko ren dolivery hoṛko do arho bạṛiyaj sikhao dorkar'koa.
text: Ena, hana hapta re Speedy Delivery leka inak ad'ge kharap anubhab hoylen tingen. Koy inak oṛak' te parcel supurtang miting tahekan, 12/B, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050 re, menkhan koy badli re 12/C re koy emkeda! Bhagya te, inren tehen koy fon keding, menkhan jodi koy baṅ fon kede khan do chi hoy koka? In sapap' ge CCD pakka re enag thao' china lekate lelag etah tahekan. Sari katha, unkren delivery hor' koy ad'ge besh training darkar.
